name: Get The Food - Alpha
description:
Hello and welcome to our game 'Get the Food'.

We are currently running a very short user testing so it would be much appreciated if you would take a few minutes to answer some questions:

https://forms.gle/uTPvA3Xdh8VVmW6W7

This game is a students project developed by a group of four for the wintersemester 2021. It is in a very early stage so it may contain bugs and unfinished features!

The game is about a puppy living in an apartment full of cat lovers with their cats trying to get rid of you. Steal their food by outsmarting them and get to the mighty food room!

We hope you enjoy!
